timeline.bodyText:
Since self.suse_products is expected to be a list now, maybe we should also:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                self.suse_products = {}
          
          
            
                self.suse_products = []
timeline.author: meaksh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,17 +19,13 @@ class SuseData:
   def __init__(self):
     log_debug(4, "SuseData initialized")
     # format:
-    # suse_products { 'guid' = ...
-    #                 'secret' = ...
-    #                 'ostarget' = ...
-    #                 'products' = [{ 'name' = ..., 'version' = ..., 'release' = ..., 'arch' = ..., 'baseproduct' = ...},
-    #                               ...]
-    #               }
+    # suse_products [{ 'name' = ..., 'version' = ..., 'release' = ..., 'arch' = ..., 'baseproduct' = ...},
+    #               ...]
     self.suse_products = {}

timeline.bodyText:
The suseServer table is removed with this PR. I think this whole line could be removed:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            suseServer                     :: rhnServer
timeline.author: meaksh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -248,9 +248,8 @@ suseImageInfoChannel           :: suseImageInfo rhnChannel
 suseImageInfoInstalledProduct  :: suseInstalledProduct suseImageInfo
 suseImageProfile               :: rhnRegTokenChannels web_customer suseImageStore
 suseImageStore                 :: suseCredentials web_customer suseImageStoreType
-suseOSTarget                   :: rhnChannelArch
 suseMinionInfo                 :: rhnServer
-suseServer                     :: rhnServer suseOSTarget
+suseServer                     :: rhnServer

timeline.message: re-add force re-registration handling and delete old server when machine_id is duplicate
drop tables suseDelServer, suseOSTarget and suseServer
schema update: drop tables suseDelServer, suseOSTarget and suseServer
remove mgr-register from Makefile and logrotate
re-add force re-registration handling and delete old server when machine_id is duplicate
